# llms-txt-php-cli

> llms-txt-php-cli is a symfony/console based CLI wrapper around the llms-txt-php library.

You can use llms-txt-php-cli to interact with /llms.txt files from the console.

## Reference

- [/llms.txt proposal](https://llmstxt.org/)
- [llms-txt-php-cli documentation](https://github.com/raphaelstolt/llms-txt-php-cli/blob/main/README.md)
